verses.name: John 12:30
verses.text: Jesus answered and said, This voice came not because of me, but for your sakes.

verses.name: John 12:31
verses.text: Now is the judgment of this world: now shall the prince of this world be cast out.

verses.name: John 12:32
verses.text: And I, if I be lifted up from the earth, will draw all men unto me.

verses.name: John 12:33
verses.text: This he said, signifying what death he should die.

verses.name: John 12:34
verses.text: The people answered him, We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever: and how sayest thou, The Son of man must be lifted up? who is this Son of man?
